What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The policies instilled are in place to protect the students and staff alike and their is no reason to fear coming here.
The campus offers several clubs for each program that is available to all participating students and can extend their understanding of the program.
students that want to be involved in a career in the technical field should definitely partake in the vast assets of knowledge that ITT has to offer to tech savy students.
The entire staff at that I have encountered are so friendly and outgoing that it is second nature to say hello everytime you see them.
There are a plethora of different clubs and workshops provided free of charge by the school and are very entertaining and knowledgable
The student lounge area is quite a tight space, however with all the offerings that are avaliable in the vending machines not to mention that some accept debit card I find them suitable
There is no dorm, however based on, over 127 campuses that are available who needs a dorm you can travel to and from home without a problem.

In an honest opinion, I am involved in the electrical engineering program and the knowledge you gain will be integral to your success. It is accelerated and is important you attend every class, no exceptions.
If you are looking to attend ITT, be sure that you know what career you want to get involved in because they will help you find a job and getting a degree is quick.
A great school if you absolutely are positive about the field of study that you want to create a career in. The staff is great and the topics that are covered are completely up to date and relevant.
pageTitle: ITT Technical Institute Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {747805=Since i started ITT Technical Institute-Torrance in June 2012, i am amazed by how fast i am understanding and learning new programs such as Auto CAD and Inventor since my career choice is drafting and design. Usually i hear colleges have huge classes and also say that because of the the amount of students in a class, teachers cant help everyone when needed, but here in ITT Technical, the classes are small and the teachers are willing to help with any question needed. Importantly ITT Technical Institute has been a great help with my financial stuff by making sure that i'm at the right track from any financial problem., 991959=The location is 1905 S. Haggerty Road, Canton, MI 48185. It's not unusual, it's a quiet, pleasant, safe area, and very easy to find (across from 275 bridge near a CVS store), 1022790=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 320162=I think this is a great college for me to attend, to further my education. When I went and toured the campus is really liked how they work mostly hands on. I am really excited about attending this college in August., 684578=Students are allowed to correspond and perform orientation ceremonies for prospective students who are still in high school. For instance, I was the Student Ambassador for the School of Criminal Justice at the Mobile, AL campus from 2008 to 2010., 806703=You get out of it what you put into it. Study and be prepared for the assignments, and it will pay off. Answer questions properly and be meticulous in grammar and formatting. Do quality research online and in the library (ours is virtual)., 670799=I have not yet attended the school, because I start on the 12th of December. However during my enrollment and orientation I felt very welcomed and supported with the staff., 452513=Really cant rate this fairly considering I have do not start classes until september., 388974=Our campus is very safe, we've never had a problem there since i'v ebeen a student as of May 2011 and i've never heard nor seen anything happen. Where my campus is the police department is too far around the corner so they're constantly passing by. And on occasions they come by to talk to the students majoring in criminal justice., 146651=have not started yet i start on the 12th of march 2012, 153830=i have currently enrolled to and will begin attending itt technical institute on 03/19/2012. so far from what i have seen as far as a tour of the campus i believe this college will definitely offer me with the resources necessary to achieve my future goal. i am looking forward to attending this nationally recognized institute this spring., 735328=I have attended this campus since September 2011, there has never been a safety issue that I am aware of, however there are many veterans and faculty that attend this campus.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Mitzi from Tallahassee, FL 06/30/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 10 out of 11 people found this review useful. 3 of 282 Categories Comments Great for these types of students ppl who are serious about getting their degree. It is too expensive to play or flunk out of. Tips for prospective students be very involved with your adviser. Do not be afraid of him/her, I can tell you first hand that they will do everything for you. AND do not plan on missing any classes. if u miss 1 day u have missed 10% of your semester. Bang for the buck yes we get the hands on experience, and everyone and I mean EVERYONE genuinely seems to enjoy being here, but I mean the price seems a bit ridiculous!! It just seems so overpriced, the community colleges charge so much less BUT community colleges have a VERY high drop out rate. ITT TECH does have a VERY good
